channel.title: InnovationX Client Issue

item.title: InnovationX Client Issue
item.dc:creator: @immortaliyftw immortaliyftw
item.description:
@immortaliyftw wrote:

Hello, Iâ€™d like to thank you in advance for reading this. I hope you can help me.

I downloaded the InnovationX client and I ran the InnovarionX server.

I edited the clients client.java like this

public URL getCodeBase()
{
if(signlink.mainapp != null)
return signlink.mainapp.getCodeBase();
try
{
return new URL("http:pked.no-ip.biz:" + (80));
}
catch(Exception _ex)
{
}
return null;
}
public String server = "pked.no-ip.biz";

Here is what it originally looked like:

public URL getCodeBase()
{
if(signlink.mainapp != null)
return signlink.mainapp.getCodeBase();
try
{
return new URL("http://www.play.innovation.org:" + (80));
}
catch(Exception _ex)
{
}
return null;
}
//public String server = "127.0.0.1";

I compiled then ran it. it still connectd through 127.0.0.1
So i found an online server and put its ip in place of pked ip both of them and compiled and ran it. It didnt connect to the other servers ip I put in but rather still my own from 127.0.0.1.

Thanks for reading hope you can help
